long_description: A smartly designed, high-performance top from Arc'teryx, the men's Actinium Sleeveless Shirt helps you stay comfortably cool during tough workouts on warm days. Mesh fabric wicks perspiration away from your skin and dries quickly to enhance the cooling effects of evaporation. Antimicrobial finish fights the odor associated with polyester workout clothing. Run farther without chafing thanks to the flatlock seams. The men's Arc'teryx Actinium Sleeveless Shirt has a relaxed fit.
short_description: A smartly designed, high-performance top from Arc'teryx, the men's Actinium Sleeveless Shirt helps you stay comfortably cool during tough workouts on warm days.
